pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tumor Mutation Detection in Plasma // Aims at detecting single nucleotide variation (SNV) and insertion/deletion (INDEL) in circulating tumor DNA (ctDNA), used as a surrogate marker for tumor, at each base position of an Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) analysis. Mutations are assessed by comparing the minor- allele frequency at each position to the measured PER in control samples.
